Index.name: change_rate_5days
Index.caption: 5日涨跌幅
Index.func: L:={$last_px}; P:={$PrevClose5Days}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_10days
Index.caption: 10日涨跌幅
Index.func: L:={$last_px}; P:={$PrevClose10Days}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_20days
Index.caption: 20日涨跌幅
Index.func: L:={$last_px}; P:={$PrevClose20Days}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_60days
Index.caption: 60日涨跌幅
Index.func: L:={$last_px}; P:={$PrevClose60Days}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_120days
Index.caption: 120日涨跌幅
Index.func: L:={$last_px};P:={$PrevClose120Days}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_250days
Index.caption: 250日涨跌幅
Index.func: L:={$last_px};P:={$PrevClose250Days}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_lastyear
Index.caption: 年初至今涨跌幅
Index.func: L:={$last_px};P:={$PrevCloseLastYear};X:=(L-P)/P*100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: latest_change_rate
Index.caption: 最新涨幅
Index.func: Fund_NAV:={$Fund_NAV};Fund_PrevNAV:={$Fund_PrevNAV}; IT(not IVD(Fund_NAV) or Fund_NAV=0 or not IVD(Fund_PrevNAV) or Fund_PrevNAV=0, ND(), Fund_NAV/Fund_PrevNAV*100 - 100)

Index.name: change_rate_1month
Index.caption: 近1月涨跌幅
Index.func: L:=HFQ({$last_px}); P:={$PreCloseLast1Month}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_3month
Index.caption: 近3月涨跌幅
Index.func: L:=HFQ({$last_px}); P:={$PreCloseLast3Month}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_6month
Index.caption: 近6月涨跌幅
Index.func: L:=HFQ({$last_px}); P:={$PreCloseLast6Month}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.name: change_rate_1year
Index.caption: 近1年涨跌幅
Index.func: L:=HFQ({$last_px}); P:={$PreCloseLast1Year}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)

Index.caption: 近2年涨跌幅

Index.name: change_rate_3year
Index.caption: 近3年涨跌幅

Index.name: change_rate_thisyear
Index.caption: 今年以来涨跌幅
Index.func: L:=HFQ({$last_px}); P:={$PrevCloseLastYearafterReinstatement}; X:=(L - P)/P * 100; IT(not IVD(L) or not IVD(P) or L=0 or P=0, ND(), X)
